publication.title: Meta-analysis for Atomicity Violations under Nested Locking
publication.abstract: We study the problem of determining, given a run of a con- current program, whether there is any alternate execution of it that vi- olates atomicity, where atomicity is dened using marked blocks of local runs. We show that if a concurrent program adopts nested locking, the problem of predicting atomicity violations is eciently solvable, with- out exploring all interleavings.
